Mike,

Long time no speak!

>That sounds like a personal choice.
>
>I find =
that some folks prefer HtmlUnit while others prefer HttpUnit.  
>At the end=
 of the day they both do basically the same thing.  
>Therefore, my advice =
would be to pick the tool you're most productive 
>using.

Does the Junit F=
AQ have a list of suitable HTTP/HTML/Web testing tools that can be used fro=
m within Junit? Or, is the answer, "it will have if you send me one"? :-)

=
>Mike

Simon
